articles.title: Here's why Monero (XMR) price is soaring despite block reorganisation backlash
articles.author: Invezz
articles.summary: Monero's blockchain suffered an 18-block reorganisation. The reorganisation rewrote roughly 36 minutes of history and left more than a hundred previously confirmed transactions temporarily invalidated, sparking a community backlash. The XMR token price is rising even after the reorganisation, however.
